Prognosis closely related recanalization rate reach 30 50 % . A new therapeutic strategy consist sequential intravenous ( IV ) thrombolysis rt-PA follow 50UI/kg IV tenecteplase ( TNK ) propose case recanalization rt-PA. Moreover interventional neuroradiologists specialist available major hospital IV sequential strategy could provide interesting alternative . DOC.brief_title: Superiority Rt-PA + Tenecteplase Comparison With Rt-PA Only Proximal Middle Cerebral Artery Occlusion
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 2 , multi-center , national , randomize , biomedical study compare two therapeutic strategy ischemic stroke associate proximal middle cerebral artery occlusion . Patients include two randomize arm new sequential treatment approach ( rt-PA + tenecteplase ) compare standard treatment ( rt-PA alone ) .
